Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui

Class JoinedToGameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui.TUIstate
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui.JoinedToGameState
public class JoinedToGameState extends TUIstate
TUIstate that represents the state of the TUI when the client is joined to a game which is not started yet.

  • Field Summary

    • command_showGames

      protected void command_showGames()
      Description copied from class: TUIstate
      Sends the request to the Controller to show the list of available games.

      Blocks the cmdLineReaderThread until the Controller responds with ShowUpdate.show_listGame(java.util.List)

      Specified by:
      command_showGames in class TUIstate

    • command_ready

      protected void command_ready()
      Sends the request to the Controller to set the client as ready to play. It calls TUIstate.stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.
      Specified by:

    • command_refresh

      protected void command_refresh()
      Description copied from class: TUIstate
      Sometimes, due to different terminal setup and properties the printed tui could break. This command refresh and prints all the previous printed TUIareas.
      Specified by:
      command_refresh in class TUIstate
      See Also:
